Description:
Blood Knights tells the story of Jeremy , a vampire hunter , who in the time of one of the missions was bitten and now that he is related by blood to the sexy and mysterious vampiressoy , Alice. Former sworn enemies must work together to get rid of them threw in okov.Igra is a bloody , vampire action- RPG where there is intense fights , tons of weapons , items and vampiric abilities, allowing players to control their enemies. The action takes place in the Middle Ages , and Alice and Jeremy playable as a single player campaign in cooperative mode.
